name: Animals Matching Blocks for Kids
description:
Join the adventure in a fun filled Memory game with Unlimited levels and smooth gameplay for Non-stop fun.

Choose from different themes like Farm animals, Wild animals, Sea Creatures and Lovely Insects. More to come, we promise :)

Child Friendly game with beautifully designed graphics for Kids. Great learning experience which will not only sharpen the memory but will also make them learn more about different animals and sounds.

Unlimited fun which will make kids busy for long hours. It will be a guaranteed fun for your little one. It has Child friendly interface with a soothing music.

Game Features:

- Universal Game (works on all Apple devices).
- 4 different themes to play with : Farm Animals, Wild Animals, Sea Creatures, Insects.
- Make high scores and share it on Facebook and Twitter
- Gamecenter Integration allows you to check the highest scores in all 4 themes.
- Beautifully designed levels with lovely backgrounds and animals.
- Clear and pleasant sounds.

What's Inside:

- 32 different Animal blocks to play and new words to learn through sounds.
- 4 beautifully hand painted backgrounds.
- Scores and star rating for child encouragement.

**Free version app comes with additional purchasing of themes**
